content.text: Match ends, Everton 3, Swansea City 1.
Second Half ends, Everton 3, Swansea City 1.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Alfie Mawson.
Attempt blocked. Ademola Lookman (Everton) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sandro Ramírez.
Foul by Kyle Naughton (Swansea City).
Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Everton. Sandro Ramírez replaces Wayne Rooney.
Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Alfie Mawson (Swansea City).
Attempt saved. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson.
Leroy Fer (Swansea City) is shown the yellow card.
Jonjoe Kenny (Everton) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jonjoe Kenny (Everton).
Foul by Jonjoe Kenny (Everton).
Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Swansea City. Sam Clucas replaces Tom Carroll.
Roque Mesa (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton).
Substitution, Everton. Ademola Lookman replaces Aaron Lennon.
Foul by Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton).
Kyle Naughton (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Tom Davies (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Roque Mesa (Swansea City).
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Federico Fernández.
Attempt blocked. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson.
Substitution, Swansea City. Jordan Ayew replaces Nathan Dyer.
Goal!  Everton 3, Swansea City 1. Wayne Rooney (Everton) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Martin Olsson (Swansea City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Everton. Jonjoe Kenny draws a foul in the penalty area.
Idrissa Gueye (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Leroy Fer (Swansea City).
Attempt missed. Nathan Dyer (Swansea City) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Roque Mesa.
Foul by Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton).
Kyle Naughton (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Tammy Abraham (Swansea City).
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Mason Holgate.
Attempt blocked. Kyle Naughton (Swansea City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Foul by Aaron Lennon (Everton).
Roque Mesa (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Everton 2, Swansea City 1. Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Wayne Rooney.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Jonjoe Kenny.
Substitution, Everton. Tom Davies replaces Morgan Schneiderlin.
Attempt missed. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Gylfi Sigurdsson with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Federico Fernández.
Attempt saved. Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Martin Olsson.
Federico Fernández (Swansea City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Mason Holgate (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tammy Abraham (Swansea City).
Nathan Dyer (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonjoe Kenny (Everton).
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Leroy Fer (Swansea City) because of an injury.
Leroy Fer (Swansea City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Morgan Schneiderlin (Everton).
Second Half begins Everton 1, Swansea City 1.
First Half ends, Everton 1, Swansea City 1.
Goal!  Everton 1, Swansea City 1. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal following a set piece situation.
Penalty saved! Wayne Rooney (Everton) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Penalty Everton. Aaron Lennon draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Roque Mesa (Swansea City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Idrissa Gueye (Everton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Roque Mesa (Swansea City).
Attempt missed. Martin Olsson (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Roque Mesa.
Offside, Everton. Gylfi Sigurdsson tries a through ball, but Ashley Williams is caught offside.
Foul by Leroy Fer (Swansea City).
Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Idrissa Gueye (Everton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Tom Carroll (Swansea City).

Foul by Nathan Dyer (Swansea City).
Goal!  Everton 0, Swansea City 1. Leroy Fer (Swansea City) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tom Carroll with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Idrissa Gueye.

Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Kyle Naughton.
Attempt missed. Luciano Narsingh (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Tammy Abraham.
Attempt saved. Dominic Calvert-Lewin (Everton) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Mason Holgate.
Attempt missed. Roque Mesa (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left.
Attempt missed. Wayne Rooney (Everton) right footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by Cuco Martina with a cross.
Corner,  Everton. Conceded by Federico Fernández.

Substitution, Swansea City. Tammy Abraham replaces Wilfried Bony because of an injury.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
